column2: an A.M. Eatery////We had a long wait which is usual!! They do have have a long wait with lots of fun things to keep yourself and kids entertained. Once we were in..the waitress took a little long and probably overworked . The food that came after than was delicious to the last bite. We ordered different French toast
column4: Mexican omelette and some more. Will be back but will plan better so won't have that long a wait!!!
